title: ninaiduruguvAi
sahitya:
ninainduruguvAi nenjE nitAnandattai t-tANDavanai


anupallavi

  manattuyar pOkkiDa mAyai vilagiDa anavaratamum avan ambuja pAdattai


caraNam 1    inmukham kATTi inbamAip-pEshi nanmai peTrup-pin nAgamAi mAriDum
 narargaLai nambi nI nAlinam tanilE paradavikkAmal pArvati nAthanai
    caraNam 2    iSTargaLena nI inburum avargaL kaSTam vandAl unnaik-kai viDuvar nija
 iSTan avanE vErevarumillai kaNDAi iniyan nAmattai innal tavirkkum amudai
